tooltip.laicaps.astronomy_notebook.0: A trusty Notebook where you note down
tooltip.laicaps.astronomy_notebook.1: all of your findings and thoughts about
tooltip.laicaps.astronomy_notebook.2: the stars above and the earth bellow.
tooltip.laicaps.asha_teleporter.0: Quick and dirty creative mode teleporter

tooltip.laicaps.ember_teleporter.0: Quick and dirty creative mode teleporter
tooltip.laicaps.basic_microchip.0: A small basic microchip found in Asha
tooltip.laicaps.basic_microchip.1: left behind by whatever once inhabited it.
tooltip.laicaps.refined_microchip.0: A refined microchip found in Lunamar.
tooltip.laicaps.refined_microchip.1: You are unsure why or how it got there.
tooltip.laicaps.advanced_microchip.0: An advanced microchip found in Ember.
tooltip.laicaps.advanced_microchip.1: It's hot to the touch... is it processing something
tooltip.laicaps.advanced_microchip.2: or just leftover heat from Ember?
tooltip.laicaps.enderblaze_fuel.0: A strong fuel made by combining
tooltip.laicaps.enderblaze_fuel.1: coal with pristine ender pearl dust.
tooltip.laicaps.enderblaze_fuel.2: Can be used as rocket fuel.
tooltip.laicaps.pristine_enderpearl_dust: Dust carefully brushed off an ender pearl.
It's incredibly shiny and radiating with energy.
item.laicaps.starflies_jar.0: A jar filled with glowing Starflies.
item.laicaps.jar.1: Can be used to make jam or
item.laicaps.oakheart_berries_jam.0: A delicious Jar of oakheart berries.
item.laicaps.oakheart_berries_jam.1: Better be eat it before a Nimble
tooltip.laicaps.ember_globe.0: A surprisingly accurate model of Ember,
tooltip.laicaps.ember_globe.1: obtained very rarely from chests in Ember
tooltip.laicaps.asha_globe.0: A fascinatingly accurate model of Asha,
tooltip.laicaps.asha_globe.1: down to every river and ravine.
tooltip.laicaps.asha_globe.2: Obtained very rarely from chests in Asha.
tooltip.laicaps.lunamar_globe.2: Obtained very rarely from chests in Lunamar
tooltip.laicaps.bluetale.0: A shimmering fish found in Asha with a glowing blue tail.
tooltip.laicaps.bluetale.1: Praised for bringing good luck to anglers.
tooltip.laicaps.cooked_bluetale.1: A shame it had to end like this.
tooltip.laicaps.redtale.0: A shimmering fish found in Asha with a glowing red tail.
tooltip.laicaps.redtale.1: Scorned for bringing bad luck to anglers.
tooltip.laicaps.cooked_redtale.1: The only thing it's good for.
tooltip.laicaps.red_herring.0: A great sign of more fishes to come!
tooltip.laicaps.red_herring.1: Or maybe that's why it's got that name?
tooltip.laicaps.avian.0: A rare type of fish that is found at night.
tooltip.laicaps.twilight_trout.0: A rare trout which only surfaces around midnight.
tooltip.laicaps.thundercharged_eel.0: This Eel was hit by a lightning strike
tooltip.laicaps.thundercharged_eel.1: and became electrified. Better not to touch it.
tooltip.laicaps.meadow_perch.0: A beautiful perch. Would make for a great
tooltip.laicaps.meadow_perch.1: meal if it weren't for it's sharp scales.
tooltip.laicaps.solar_carp.0: A carp most common to surface during daytime.
tooltip.laicaps.solar_carp.1: Easy enough to catch, makes for a decent
tooltip.laicaps.very_tiny_shark.0: An incredibly tiny shark! Although small, still fierce.
tooltip.laicaps.azure_tuna.1: A common catch in the high sea.
tooltip.laicaps.scarlet_tuna.1: A common catch in the high sea.
tooltip.laicaps.sage_tuna.1: A common catch in the high sea.
tooltip.laicaps.karpenjoe.0: A majestic carp glowing in modding knowledge.
tooltip.laicaps.karpenjoe.1: It is said anglers eat it for good luck before debugging.
tooltip.laicaps.stormsail_ray.0: A rare ray which surfaces only whilst raining.
tooltip.laicaps.stormsail_ray.1: Unfortunately it's thick meat doesn't allow
tooltip.laicaps.sunfang_eel.0: An Eel who hate the rain and will hide
tooltip.laicaps.sunfang_eel.1: away at any sign of precipitation.
tooltip.laicaps.crimson_starfish.1: Not to be confused for a 1-star fish.
tooltip.laicaps.verdant_seahorse.0: One of many seahorses that habit Lunamar.
tooltip.laicaps.verdant_seahorse.1: This one has green fins, indicating it's age.
tooltip.laicaps.radiant_seahorse.0: One of many seahorses that habit Lunamar.
tooltip.laicaps.radiant_seahorse.1: The blue colored fins indicate it's still young
tooltip.laicaps.octo.0: An Octo, one of the most dominant species in Lunamar.
tooltip.laicaps.octo.1: They won't usually be aggressive unless provoked,
tooltip.laicaps.octo.2: although they can be quite territorial.
tooltip.laicaps.red_reef_octo.0: An Octo, one of the most dominant species in Lunamar.
tooltip.laicaps.red_reef_octo.1: This Octo decided to make a red conch into his lair.
tooltip.laicaps.red_reef_octo.2: although they can be quite territorial.
tooltip.laicaps.lumen_drifter.0: Not to be confused with a starfish, these creatures
tooltip.laicaps.lumen_drifter.1: are a lot smaller and thinner in size, and are
tooltip.laicaps.bubblemouth.0: A chubby slow-swimming fish from Lunamar.
tooltip.laicaps.bubblemouth.1: Often seen drifting through moonshade kelp,
tooltip.laicaps.bubblemouth.2: blowing tiny bubbles for no apparent reason.
tooltip.laicaps.cooked_bubblemouth.1: Goes perfect with some moonshade fruit.
tooltip.laicaps.moonray.0: A slow moving ray that gently glides along the waves.
tooltip.laicaps.glimpuff.0: A unique fish which feeds on moonshade fruit.
tooltip.laicaps.glimpuff.1: It's digestive system absorbs the glowing properties
tooltip.laicaps.glimpuff.2: of the fruit making it glow for a while after eating.
tooltip.laicaps.cooked_glimpuff.1: Goes perfect with some moonshade fruit.
item.laicaps.snuffler_chop.0: A raw cut of meat from a Snuffler
item.laicaps.cooked_snuffler_chop.0: A tasty chop from a snuffler
tooltip.laicaps.water_container.0: Dev block to contain water in the
tooltip.laicaps.moonshade_seagrass.0: Seagrass resembling that of the overworld,
tooltip.laicaps.moonshade_seagrass.1: but due to the lack of sunlight it has a bluer tint.
tooltip.laicaps.moonshade_fruit.1: glowing with a soft purple hue.
tooltip.laicaps.moonshade_fruit.2: It pulses gently, as if alive.

tooltip.laicaps.ember_entry.1: Some notes about Ember were hastily

tooltip.laicaps.asha_entry.1: passed by Asha before you. Its information

gui.notebook.menu.entry1.name: Introduction
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.left.2: If I am to succeed into my space
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.left.3: journey, it's best to keep all
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.left.4: my findings in a centralized space.
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.left.10: I'll note it down for future me!
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.right.4: pages and come back when needed!
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.right.16: Using these markers at the bottom
gui.notebook.menu.entry1.right.17: I can quickly cycle through the
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.name: About the Telescope
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.left.2: The first step of space travel is
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.left.3: picking a good target. For that
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.left.4: I will of course need a telescope!
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.left.15: Once I have a telescope built it
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.left.16: should be easy enough to wait for
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.left.18: and gaze upon the vast emptiness
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.right.3: With a diamond, some gold, and
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.right.4: some better lenses, I should be
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.right.5: able to upgrade a spyglass into
gui.notebook.menu.entry2.right.8: I will also need a stronger stand
gui.notebook.menu.entry3.name: Building a Spaceship
gui.notebook.menu.entry3.right.3: Once I got a blueprint I just
gui.notebook.menu.entry3.right.4: need to use the power of the
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.name: Fueling and Takeoff!
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.left.4: dust I can infuse 4 coal into a
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.left.6: can be used as fuel for my
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.left.11: screens I can check fuel levels,
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.left.13: and even spin my little globe!
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.right.3: It's best to make sure I have
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.right.4: enough fuel for the return trip
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.right.5: too. Who knows how long I can stay
gui.notebook.menu.entry4.right.11: it's as easy as interacting with
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.name: Takeoff!
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.left.3: Asha looks like a nice suitable
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.left.4: planet for my first trip. Some iron
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.left.5: tools will probably suffice for this
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.left.6: journey and be able to fight off
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.left.12: can be customized such as the
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.left.13: carpets we sit in, and the
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.right.5: to pick from, such as storage,
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.right.7: Feel free to suggest ideas in
gui.notebook.menu.entry5.right.14: it's time to start the take-off

gui.notebook.ember.entry1.left.13: The surface glows from it's rivers
gui.notebook.ember.entry1.left.16: Smoke covers the land with no
gui.notebook.ember.entry1.left.19: Anything that inhabits it must be
gui.notebook.ember.entry1.left.20: just as unwelcoming as it's planet

gui.notebook.asha.entry1.name: §dAsha§r - Planet
gui.notebook.asha.entry1.left.11: Asha appears to be a friendly
gui.notebook.asha.entry1.left.12: planet with no signs of danger.
gui.notebook.asha.entry1.left.18: The perfect planet for my first
gui.notebook.asha.entry2.name: §dAsha§r - Fauna & Flora
gui.notebook.asha.entry2.left.12: Like a twin planet to the Overworld.
gui.notebook.asha.entry2.left.18: I can barely believe a planet so
gui.notebook.asha.entry2.left.19: full of life was hiding right next
gui.notebook.asha.entry2.left.20: to the overworld in the sky.
gui.notebook.asha.entry2.right.3: needed but every creature I come
gui.notebook.asha.entry3.name: §dAsha§r - Lunarveil
gui.notebook.asha.entry3.left.13: I've named them Lunarveil for now.
gui.notebook.asha.entry3.left.15: They appear to open under the
gui.notebook.asha.entry3.right.4: in my garden back in the
gui.notebook.asha.entry3.right.6: hurt to take a few back home...
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.name: §dAsha§r - Sweetlily
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.left.12: sweet. One of the tiny creatures
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.left.13: just ate the petals right off.
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.left.15: It only makes sense I name
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.right.3: Grinding it to a powder is easy
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.right.4: enough, it makes for the perfect
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.right.16: really liked this powder. If I
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.right.17: could find some kind of fruit I
gui.notebook.asha.entry4.right.18: could make treats for them and
